entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
